scripts.serve: npx tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput & node ./esbuild-watch.js & npx tailwindcss --input ./src/main.css --output ./public/dist/bundle.css --watch & npx web-dev-server --watch
scripts.build: npx tsc && npx esbuild ./public/dist/main.js --bundle --outfile=./public/dist/bundle.js --metafile=./public/dist/esbuild-metafile.json && npx tailwindcss --input ./src/main.css --output ./public/dist/bundle.css
